successes.title: VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3! Game Composers of the World UNITE
successes.description: The 3rd album from the award-winning multimedia symphonic/rock decade long world touring video game concert event... Video Games Live!

Pledges.description: Name to appear as a donor in VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 DVD/Blu-Ray credits and digital CD credits, PLUS for helping us out you'll receive an exclusive bonus Kickstarter 15 track video game music compilation digital album download entitled VIDEO GAMES LIVE - BONUS ROUND! NOT SOLD IN STORES OR ONLINE! ONLY AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY THROUGH KICKSTARTER! This additional collectors album includes music from VGL creator and game composer Tommy Tallarico, VGL conductor (and Grammy Award winner) Christopher Tin (Civilization IV), VGL guest conductor (and Grammy nominated) Austin Wintory (Journey), VGL guest conductor Eimear Noone, Balder's Gate II composer Craig Garfinkle, VGL performer Frank Klepacki (Command & Conquer), VGL vocalist Jillian Aversa (Halo, God of War), Andrew "zircon" Aversa (Soul Calibur V, Street Fighter II HD), a special OCRemix FF VI "Terra's Theme" AND MORE! This album collection is NOT VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3, it is simply a bonus compilation gift for being a part of our project.  Immortalize friends names with this gift and buy multiples!
$5 tier PLUS a digital copy of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 album.

$10 tier PLUS a digital download of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album, PLUS a digital copy of original artwork of Earthworm Jim playing a guitar created exclusively for Tommy Tallarico (composer of Earthworm Jim) from EWJ creator Doug TenNaple.

(Duck Hunt Early Bird SPECIAL! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project) - $20 tier PLUS an exclusive HD digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 full length feature video (never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of  the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show.

(STAGE 1-1 sold out Day 1!  This tier is similar except we substitute the LEVEL 2 HD video download with the LEVEL 2 album download) - $20 tier PLUS an exclusive digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 album containing special tracks not available on the CD (and never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. [$125 value!]

(STAGE 1-2 SOLD OUT! So we have decided to offer the same tier again but with no limit quantities as it was the most requested tier) $20 tier PLUS an exclusive digital download of the current VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 2 album containing special tracks not available on the CD (and never released outside the U.S. & Canada), PLUS an exclusive Kickstarter special collectors edition VIDEO GAMES LIVE - VOLUME ONE album digital download (includes tracks not available on the original album release), PLUS a digital download of a new Austin Wintory Piano Arrangement album made specifically for this project based on the Grammy nominated Journey soundtrack, PLUS a digital Hi-Res download of the Video Games Live Tron Light Cycle blueprint used to make the life-sized Tron Light Cycle that appears in the show. [$125 value!]

Missed out on the limited $25 tier sale? No worries! It’s still available for $35 and we’ll even throw in the newly remixed & remastered COMPLETE fully downloaded rare and limited Earthworm Jim Anthology album which includes 28 digitally recorded and mastered songs with live instruments and uniquely arranged remixes. NOT SOLD IN STORES! ONLY AVAILABLE THROUGH KICKSTARTER!, PLUS a beautiful & rare Hi-Res Video Games Live in China, digital Blizzard show poster, PLUS a rare hand drawn digital download of a Video Games Live in Taiwan poster.

(Special Rate! This limited price point is only available for the first backers of the VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3 project) - $35 tier PLUS a physical CD product of VIDEO GAMES LIVE: LEVEL 3, PLUS 2 VGL temporary tattoos, PLUS a exclusive personally limited Tommy Tallarico Video Games Live guitar pick.
